verse: Moses served the Eternal One faithfully until the end of his days. After his death, the Eternal singled out Joshua, the son of Nun, who had walked at the right hand of Moses during the wilderness wanderings.

Then Joshua spoke to the leaders of Reuben and Gad and the half-tribe of Manasseh.
